properties.areaDesc: Atlantic; Camden; Coastal Ocean; Coastal Atlantic; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 8 at 9:57AM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
At 956 AM EST, a snow squall was located over Elwood-Magnolia, or 19
miles northeast of Vineland, moving east at 60 mph. Surface
temperatures above freezing will limit snow accumulation, however, a
period of poor visibility in moderate to heavy snow is likely.

Locations impacted include...
Atlantic City, Barnegat, Pleasantville, Hammonton, Brigantine,
Absecon, Egg Harbor City, Tuckerton, Weymouth, Surf City, Port
Republic, Elwood-Magnolia, Atsion, Wading River, Warren Grove,
Wharton State Forest, Pomona, Mays Landing, Brookville and Bass River
State Forest.

This includes the following highways...
Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 3 and 29.
Garden State Parkway between mile markers 36 and 69.

Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this dangerous
snow squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads
are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the
squall passes your location.

NWSheadline: A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT ATLANTIC...SOUTHEASTERN OCEAN... SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN AND SOUTHEASTERN BURLINGTON COUNTIES
